blog.name: 04nbod
blog.title: Letters to Krypton
blog.description: A Damn Dirty Fandom blog! Old as fuck, proper old school fandom here. I remember the Doctor Who Wilderness years when the BBC showed Buffy and Roswell to fill the void in our baby hearts! British, I look at things in British-y ways. Anglophiles are beloved here. #Ancientandforever

blog.name: aqueenofmarble
blog.title: Do I Dare Disturb the Universe?

summary: Ok gendrya fam there‘s a lot happening. All these interviews with Joe are so suspicious. Apparently he told a fan at a got...
body: Ok gendrya fam there‘s a lot happening. All these interviews with Joe are so suspicious. Apparently he told a fan at a got convention that Gendry kissing Arya is meant to be? And in another interview he said Gendry and Arya must carry a torch for each other, meaning they‘re in love without realising it. And Maisie said she wants Arya to be with a nice hunk? Like? They‘re not even subtle. Idk what to think. My hopes are getting higher but I don‘t want to be disappointed. They said some of these things even after the filming of s8. They know the ending and they still talk so positively about them, with so much certainty. And then there‘s the fact that they KNOW how many people ship them so they wouldn’t say those things if they knew it‘s not gonna happen, right? Idt they‘d have the heart to give us hope and then crush it when s8 finally airs. Soo? What‘s going on? I really think it‘s gonna happen…but I‘m afraid I‘m too optimistic lol.

And then there‘s the fact that they KNOW how many people ship them so they wouldn’t say those things if they knew it‘s not gonna happen, right? Idt they‘d have the heart to give us hope and then crush it when s8 finally airs. Soo? What‘s going on? I really think it‘s gonna happen…but I‘m afraid I‘m too optimistic lol.

And in another interview he said Gendry and Arya must carry a torch for each other, meaning they‘re in love without realising it. And Maisie said she wants Arya to be with a nice hunk? Like? They‘re not even subtle. Idk what to think. My hopes are getting higher but I don‘t want to be disappointed. They said some of these things even after the filming of s8. They know the ending and they still talk so positively about them, with so much certainty. And then there‘s the fact that they KNOW how many people ship them so they wouldn’t say those things if they knew it‘s not gonna happen, right? Idt they‘d have the heart to give us hope and then crush it when s8 finally airs. Soo? What‘s going on? I really think it‘s gonna happen…but I‘m afraid I‘m too optimistic lol.

And then there‘s the fact that they KNOW how many people ship them so they wouldn’t say those things if they knew it‘s not gonna happen, right? Idt they‘d have the heart to give us hope and then crush it when s8 finally airs. Soo? What‘s going on? I really think it‘s gonna happen…but I‘m afraid I‘m too optimistic lol.

blog.name: lilpotatofangirl
blog.title: game of thrones & asoiaf unpopular opinions memes
blog.description: sharing my unpopular opinion about GoT (books, or show, or both) through memes.  But also some other cute GoT related stuff :3

body:
HOT PIE IS AZOR AHAI

I’ve some arguments about it. But first, the prophecy:

When the red star bleeds and the darkness gathers, Azor Ahai shall be born again amidst smoke and salt to wake dragons out of stone. - Melisandre, ASoS

Now, let’s analize the elements

  1. Hot Pie’s character was presented to us at the beginning of ACoK, at the same time the comet came.
  2. Again, the white raven telling that Autumn is here is at the beginning of ACoK. Autumn is kinda the “ambassador” of the Winter, which is due to come. And Winter=Others-Long Night, so we can said that ‘darkness gathers’.
  3. Now it’s more tricky Smoke. Hot Pie lived in Kings Landing, doing -surprisingly- hot pies. When you cook pies, and they are hot, smoke comes out. Salt. Hot Pie is Arya’s friend. One of Arya’s names is Salty, from Saltpans(ASoS). So, we got the Salt too.
  4. Dragons out of stone. Currently unknown lol.

What do you think about it?

Anyway, if anyone didn’t realized, this was pure ironical. Even if someone can actually believe in it, if they want to.

Lmao.

blog.description: Camila, too young to be so old, Brasil. Bit of a loner. Coffee + Sleep = my (un)life.I spend a lot of time making gifs instead of studying.[I once was: alderaaniandiplomat]

summary: hufflepuffdisaster replied to your post  “Are we sure Arya is a real Stark? She seems to be the only one in that...” Maybe she...
body:
hufflepuffdisaster replied to your post “Are we sure Arya is a real Stark? She seems to be the only one in that…”

Maybe she is just the smartest cookie among the Stark’s

Maybe it’s something contagious and our dear Arya is immune to it? I mean even Catelyn who is a Tully shows some really poor judgement here and there

Anyway, joking aside, Arya is a really smart cookie and I love that girl for that. Favorite Stark ♥ ♥ ♥

blog.name: i-crossed-the-narrow-sea
blog.title: Valar Morghulis
blog.description: I'm here mostly for Arya x Jaqen or Jaqarya, if you prefer, amazing fanfiction authors whose stories help me to deal with the damage the showmakers did to Arya and Jaqen storyline, especially Braavos part. Obsessed with Jaqen H'ghar and Arya Stark and the House of Black and White ;) I love Braavos above all and I hope Arya and Jaqen story will be much better in the next book than what we've got so far in the show. I also love Tyrion  Lannister (really hope he'll get better lines next season), Jon Snow and ser Bronn of the Blackwater. I ship Arya and Jaqen, Tyrion and Tysha (I believe there is hope for them in the book) , Jaime and Brienne, Sansa and Sandor though I also like the idea of Sansa reuniting with Tyrion. I believe Rhaegar Targaryen never raped  Lyanna Stark but saved her from awful Robert Baratheon.

Arya is my favorite character ever and I DREAM of seeing her wearing...

So… I made this weeks ago and finally decide to post it!!

Arya is my favorite character ever and I DREAM of seeing her wearing armor and kicking ass and looking BADAS:))) These are also two of my favorite quotes from the books!

(know that I’m NOT a photoshop expert and is the first time I do something like this🤗)

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

summary:
Arya: You know, I blame Theon for all of this. 
Arya: And Sansa too, I blame her.
Sansa: What did I do?
Arya: I’m sure you did...
body:
Arya: You know, I blame Theon for all of this.

Arya: And Sansa too, I blame her.

Sansa: What did I do?

Arya: I’m sure you did something.

reblog.comment:
Arya: You know, I blame Theon for all of this.

Arya: And Sansa too, I blame her.

Sansa: What did I do?

Arya: I’m sure you did something.

trail.content_raw:
Arya: You know, I blame Theon for all of this.

Arya: And Sansa too, I blame her.

Sansa: What did I do?

Arya: I’m sure you did something.
trail.content:
Arya: You know, I blame Theon for all of this.

Arya: And Sansa too, I blame her.

Sansa: What did I do?

Arya: I’m sure you did something.

summary: The unaired convo after Arya slit Baelish’s throat in the Great Hall at Winterfell in the Season 7 finale.  Something to...
caption:
The unaired convo after Arya slit Baelish’s throat in the Great Hall at Winterfell in the Season 7 finale.

Something to consider: If they buried Littlefinger outside the walls, he could be resurrected as a wight by the Night King when the Army of the Dead comes knocking.

Illustration by Justin Hall and Tristan Cooper at Dorkly.
